content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lead
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 11, "index": 14}, {"type": "mule_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 15}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 64, "index": 26}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "music_disc_mellohi", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "structure_void", "quantity": 4, "index": 38}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 10, "index": 39}, {"type": "nether_wart_block", "quantity": 14, "index": 40}, {"type": "lily_pad", "quantity": 44, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft lead, I need to place 4 strings in a square shape. I will start by placing the first string at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 11, "index": 14}, {"type": "mule_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 15}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 64, "index": 26}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "music_disc_mellohi", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "structure_void", "quantity": 4, "index": 38}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 10, "index": 39}, {"type": "nether_wart_block", "quantity": 14, "index": 40}, {"type": "lily_pad", "quantity": 44, "index": 43}]
thought: Next, I need to place the second string to the right of the first one. I will place it at slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1
